original:
It was a quiet Wednesday evening, and I found myself alone at home, lazily browsing the internet. The rhythmic clicking of my mouse accompanied my curiosity as I unfolded article after article, disappearing into the vast expanses of the digital world.
As I scrolled down the screen, my ears suddenly perked up at the sound of a faint cough, barely audible from the room next to mine. I tilted my head
sampled:
It was a quiet Wednesday evening, and I found me alone at home, lazily browsing the internet. The rhythmic clicking of my mouse accompanied my curiosity as I unfolded article after post, disappearing into the vast expanses throughout the digital world.
As I scrolled down the screen, my ears suddenly perked up at the sound by a faint cough, barely audible from the room next to mine. I tilted my focus
